title: 22 Shawn Johnson: The Mindset of an Olympic Champion
description: Do you know what it feels like to be a world champion and Olympic gold medalist? Most of us will never make the Olympics, but what if you could LEARN and APPLY this same mindset to your business, career, health and relationships? If you're like me, you know it would be a powerful mindset to […]
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
